com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.figures

Class CommentFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.figures.BentCornerFigure
        • com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.figures.CommentFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure

    public class CommentFigure
extends BentCornerFigure
    A Figure with a bent corner and an embedded TextFlow within a FlowPage that contains text.
    Version:
    $Revision: 187 $ $Id: CommentFigure.java 187 2013-06-03 05:47:37Z salekseev $
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentFigure()
      Creates a new CommentFigure with a default MarginBorder size of DEFAULT_CORNER_SIZE - 3 and a FlowPage containing a TextFlow with the style WORD_WRAP_SOFT.
      CommentFigure(int borderSize)
      Creates a new CommentFigure with a MarginBorder that is the given size and a FlowPage containing a TextFlow with the style WORD_WRAP_SOFT.
